name: CCG for Video Game Funkin
description:
It’s a battle of wits, and building decks to create powerful strategies with a lot of favorite characters from fmf, and more video games.
Collect powerful cards and create mighty decks. Summon minions and sling spells to seize control of ever-shifting battlegrounds. Wield a masterful strategy and defeat all enemies.

Features:

HONE YOUR SKILLS: Practice against computer-controlled characters, and duel a lot of favorite characters from undertale, fmaf and more video games - these legend characters are all here!

AMAZING FIRST STARTING MISSIONS: Fun starting missions equip you with real experiences, improve your skills set, only a few seconds until your first duel!

DEFEAT FINAL BOSS: To take your skills to the Battlegrounds? You take on the roles of familiar characters, craft powerful boards of recruited minions, and duel in those amazing Arenas until you defeat final Boss!

PVP ONLINE PLAY : play again players all over the world or with your friends

Game rules:

COLLECTING YOUR DECK: Build your deck to harness the abilities of amazing minions and spells – wield the power of dual-class cards by some first practising battlegrounds.

DEFEAT YOUR ENEMIES, FIGHT FOR GLORY. Master your deck, and assemble powerful combos, in this fast-paced card game of cunning strategy. Seize control over the battlegrounds.

DISCLAIMER:
Video game card battle is an unofficial fan application. It is not affiliated with or endorsed by games or films management, or record label.
This app does not include any copyrighted material.
This app is for entertainment purposes only.

FEEDBACK:
Feel free to comment us your requests, issues, and suggestions in review, we will try to add more characters and make better games ever! Thank you for download this game! Have fun!
